resources.string: Enter the temperature you want to convert, select the origin unit and destination unit. The app will calculate the conversion result.

Temperature Conversion Application is an application that helps users to convert temperature from one unit to another such as Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin, and Reamur. 
 
This application is made for Assessment 1 programming for mobile devices 1.
